languages.text: "Получается, эта планета — мертвец, что встретил смерть, соответствующую его размерам".
"So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."
languages.original_text: "Получается, эта планета — мертвец, что встретил смерть, соответствующую его размерам".

traits.locale_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."

traits.locale_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Und so ereilte diesen einst lebendigen Planeten an einem bestimmten Punkt der Vergangenheit ein für seine Größe angemessener Tod."
languages.original_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."

traits.locale_text: "Und so ereilte diesen einst lebendigen Planeten an einem bestimmten Punkt der Vergangenheit ein für seine Größe angemessener Tod."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Or donc, à un moment donné dans le passé, cette planète grouillante de vie a connu une mort à la hauteur de sa taille. »
languages.original_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."

traits.locale_text: « Or donc, à un moment donné dans le passé, cette planète grouillante de vie a connu une mort à la hauteur de sa taille. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Así que en algún momento este planeta se encontró con una muerte proporcional a su tamaño».
languages.original_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."

traits.locale_text: «Así que en algún momento este planeta se encontró con una muerte proporcional a su tamaño».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「つまり、過去のある時点で、かつて生きていたこの惑星は、その大きさに見合った死を迎えたということね」
languages.original_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、過去のある時点で、かつて生きていたこの惑星は、その大きさに見合った死を迎えたということね」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “也就是说，在过去的某个时刻，这颗曾一度拥有生命的行星迎来了彻底的死亡。”
languages.original_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，在过去的某个时刻，这颗曾一度拥有生命的行星迎来了彻底的死亡。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Bu bir zamanlar yaşayan gezegen, geçmişin bir noktasında boyutuna yakışan bir ölümle karşılaşmış."
languages.original_text: "So, at some point in the past, this once living planet met a death proportional to its size."
